message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $100?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it. What do you think?
